references.paper_title: Clinical-grade computational pathology using weakly supervised deep learning on whole slide images
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in the field, introducing weakly supervised deep learning for pathology and demonstrating clinical-grade performance.

references.paper_title: Scaling self-supervised learning for histopathology with masked image modeling
references.reason: This paper presents a significant advancement in self-supervised learning for pathology, achieving remarkable capabilities and detecting patterns beyond human capabilities.

references.paper_title: Virchow: A million-slide digital pathology foundation model
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale pathology foundation model (Virchow), demonstrating capabilities that aid pathologists in routine tasks and showcases the potential of FMs in healthcare.

references.paper_title: Towards a general-purpose foundation model for computational pathology
references.reason: This paper explores the development of a general-purpose foundation model for pathology, aiming to address challenges like staining variations and improve clinical applicability.

references.paper_title: Phikon-v2, a large and public feature extractor for biomarker prediction
references.reason: This paper introduces a robust and reliable feature extractor (Phikon-v2) for pathology, advancing progress towards clinical adoption of pathology FMs.
